reviewText:
I love all the Perry Mason movies.  I can't wait to get the last ones, (ie: Case of the Deadly Kiss)  is one of them.  I have purchased all of the new Perry Mason volumes.  Now I am waiting for the last ones.

Donna B

I bought this DVD as a gift. I think it's great they are FINALLY coming out with the Perry Mason movies on DVD. My only complaint is that there are only 2 movies per DVD, so it's going to be a little pricey to be able to pick them all up. (Only 1 DVD per package)  I waited until this one went on sale. (Since I bought it as a gift, I can't tell you if it has subtitles or not, or if there are any extras.) But you can't go wrong with Raymond Burr as Perry Mason.
Both movies were enjoyable to watch, but I enjoyed the other purchase "Return of Perry Mason" and "The Notorious Nun" more.
bueno
Perry and Della perfect team.
great
Another great duo of entertaining PM movies. Patty Duke puts on a bit of a different face for this movies. You just never know what to expect with a PM surprise.

The Lady in The Lake is one of my favorite full length PM movies. I will soon have completed my collection and have already started my repeat watching them. Thank goodness for dvd's. I recommend these movies and one-hour tv shows to anyone who loves the good old days w/o unacceptable swear words and can be enjoyed by the entire family, no matter the age.
Love them all so far.  Can't wait to get the next ones.
Love it.  Hope to get all eventually.
great
Great, as always. I love these movies. Just a few more till I have them all
Loads of fun to watch.

This Perry Mason Double Feature lives up to all the fans of the TV shows and dose it in a way that makes you really appreciate just how well done these moves are !  From scrip to casting to to the performance it is all done so seamlessly that when over your left re thinking what you just saw.  This is one set you well go back again and again and enjoy it every time you see it!
It's Perry Mason so it was great.
Not bad.  Definitely entertainment rather than art.  But solid vehicles.  I prefer "Lady in the Lake" of the two.  This series is a mixed bag, some fine episodes, others not so.
Great!
Great!
As I expected.
Perry Mason -  very good
We enjoy the Perry Mason made-for-TV movies.
We enjoy the Perry Mason made-for-TV movies.
I enjoyed it...
Perry Mason...loved it as a kid, love it more as an adult.
Great Perry Mason stories, big fan. Like wine, the stories get better with the years

Not the usual Guillaume but but excellent portrayal, as usual.  I've never before wanted to kick a Robert Guillame character.  he makes his characters alive and vibrant, but as usual no match for Mason.
The titles are not visible and I'm getting some comments mixed up - but regardless of the themes, the stories are good and the actors excellent.
Still love the Perry Mason movies after all these years!  Much better than most television shows we have to choose from now!

Love this dvd !!  It arrived on time and in PERFECT condition !!  Lady in the Lake is one of my favorite episodes !!  Thank you , Amazon , for making it possible for me to purchase some really WONDERFUL movies !!  :))
Wonderful dvd !!  This one , like all of the other Perry Mason TV Movies , is WONDERFUL !!  It arrived on time and in PERFECT condition !!  :))  I'm VERY pleased with my purchase !!  :))
I love Perry
Love Perry Mason tapes and was very pleased they are still available at a very reasonable price. Tapes are of excellent quality and arrived wehn promised. Great service!!

another good Terry Mason mystery definitely 5 stars
I like the Perry Mason series anyway.  I like the old series and the Perry Mason Returns series.  Both series are excellent entertainment for me.
Like all of Perry masons from early years on and my favorite ones is with William R. moses playing Ken Malansky quite a team Perry Della and Ken make a good team
love it

Disappointed!  Modern Perry Mason.  Looking for Noir " Lady in the Lake" and the two I've found are not what I saw.

I own all of the Perry Mason episodes and have enjoyed them for some 50 years.  I also enjoy the movies.
Love Perry Mason and love Raymond Burr and Della and all the other characters.
